name: incongruous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unusual or different from what is around or from what is generally happening: The new computer looked incongruous in the dark book-filled library.seem incongruous It seems incongruous to have a woman as the editor of a men's magazine.

Add to word list
Add to word list
appearing strange or wrong within a particular situation: Such a modern office building looks incongruous in the quaint little town.
